# **_for_ Loops**
```{r}
dl = list(
  a = rnorm(20, 3, 1),
  b = rnorm(20, 0, 5),
  c = rnorm(20, 10, .2),
  d = rnorm(20, -3, 1)
)

is.list(dl)

df = tibble(
  a = rnorm(20, 3, 1),
  b = rnorm(20, 0, 5),
  c = rnorm(20, 10, .2),
  d = rnorm(20, -3, 1)
)

is.list(df)

df$a
```

```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) == 1) {
    stop("Cannot be computed for length 1 vectors")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  tibble(
    mean = mean_x, 
    sd = sd_x
  )
}
```

```{r}
mean_and_sd(df[[1]])
mean_and_sd(df[[2]])
mean_and_sd(df[[3]])
mean_and_sd(df[[4]])
```

## _for_ loop
```{r}
output = vector("list", length = 4)

for (i in 1:4) {
  
  output [[i]] = mean_and_sd(df[[i]])
  
}

output

output = map(df, mean_and_sd)

output_median = map(df, median)

output_median

output_summary = map(df, summary)

output_summary

output_median = map_dbl(df, median)

output_median

output = map_dfr(df, mean_and_sd)

output
```
